overview: Jack Kundamal is responsible for managing Connectiva’s global operations. Jack has driven enterprise growth in software licensing, consulting and managed services which has been instrumental in transforming Connectiva. Jack has also made key contributions to business development and product strategy. He has more than 13 years of leadership experience in managing complex software development and professional services and also in leading global teams in business development and product management. Prior to joining Connectiva, Jack held senior management positions at LHS and Schlumberger-SEMA.
